title: How to write a mini biography about myself - Quora

response.answer_text: How short? Many of the conferences I attend and speak at will limit a bio to 100–150 words. That’s not much. You want to hit the highlights. If it’s germane, a sentence about school (ONLY university or above. What schools, degrees granted, major). A sentence or two about what your profession is, A listing of your professional qualifications (e.g. wrote a published paper, won an award, recognized in a peer journal, spoke at a conference). A brief discussion (maybe two sentences) about what you’re currently doing in your field. A sentence or two about your interests or hobbies.
